column4: I'm using the 9.04 Release Candidate and my ntfs partitions won't mount during boot.  anyone know why, and how to fix this? (my fstab => http://dpaste.com/35111/ )
I'm using the 9.04 Release Candidate and my ntfs partitions won't mount during boot.  anyone know why, and how to fix this? (my fstab => http://dpaste.com/35111/ )
try asking at #ubuntu+1 cause it's the official jaunty support channel
also make sure you've installed ntfs-3g
